original_text: And Moses came and told the people all the words of the Lord, and all the judgments: and all the people answered with one voice, and said, All the words which the Lord hath said will we do.
korean_text: 모세가 와서 여호와의 모든 말씀과 그의 모든 율례를 백성에게 전하매 그들이 한 소리로 응답하여 이르되 여호와께서 말씀하신 모든 것을 우리가 준행하리이다

sentences.original_text: and told the people all the words of the Lord
and all the people answered with one voice,
All the words which the Lord hath said will we do.
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 말씀하신 모든 말씀을 우리가 행하겠나이다
